aboutMe.me: Hello, I am Marco Antonio Grimaldo Peralta, Systems Engineer. I like web and mobile development because I can exploit my creativity in problem solving.
aboutMe.devExp: With Web Development, my love of programming was linked to my creativity, being able to develop interactive and beautiful websites quickly became my passion.
aboutMe.education: I studied engineering at ESCOM (Escuela Superior de CÃ³mputo) in Mexico and have completed various courses on the Udemy platform. My specialty is Javascript, React and CSS
